pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Curve Comparisons Using Parametric Bootstrap // Performs multiple comparison procedures on curve observations among different treatment groups. The methods are applicable in a variety of situations (such as independent groups with equal or unequal sample sizes, or repeated measures) by using parametric bootstrap. References to these procedures can be found at Konietschke, Gel, and Brunner (2014) doi:10.1090/conm/622/12431 and Westfall (2011) doi:10.1080/10543406.2011.607751.
